text.text_translated: Today, a lot of business happens between different countries. Many business people in the world use English as a common language. But the rules for talking at work can be very different in different countries. If you do not understand these different rules, it can cause problems. This can make people think bad things about you that are not true. It can also stop people from understanding each other. Etiquette is the rules for polite ways to act with other people. Business etiquette is about these rules for work. We are going to explain three big differences in business etiquette around the world. This can help you when you work with people from a different country.
